entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:46 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 08:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

Humidity: 82 %

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
